Not too long ago, Celtic were sitting seven points clear at the top of the Premiership table and most fans felt that the league was pretty much in the bag with the Rangers struggling for any kind of form. entry.title: Giorgio Chiellini makes superb claim about Celtic Park
entry.summary: It would be safe to say that Giorgio Chiellini is one of the best defenders of all time and he had some pretty positive comments about Celtic Park recently. entry.title: Celtic’s problem is very clear and needs solving quick
entry.summary: Two more dropped points mean that Celtic have well and truly allowed the Rangers to get back into the title race. A lead which once stood at seven points, could be reduced to three if Philippe Clement’s side are able to win their games in hand. entry.title: Brendan Rodgers addresses Celtic problem after draw
entry.summary: It was not the result Celtic were looking for, as they dropped two valuable points against Motherwell. David Turnbull’s goal appeared to have won it for the Hoops but the visitors equalised in the 90th minute and it ended 1-1. entry.title: Celtic pushing for priority signing in January window
entry.summary: Celtic’s January transfer window is expected to be a busy one. entry.title: Ange Postecoglou claims Celtic success gets dismissed
entry.summary: Ange Postecoglou has proven to be a major success in the Premier League since swapping Celtic for Tottenham Hotspur.
